channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Slider Revolution
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Slider Revolution

item.title: CVE-2023-6528|2024-08-02T08:35:14.535Z -- unknown -- slider%20revolution
item.description: The Slider Revolution WordPress plugin before 6.6.19 does not prevent users with at least the Author role from unserializing arbitrary content when importing sliders, potentially leading to Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-2359|2024-08-02T06:19:14.931Z -- unknown -- slider%20revolution
item.description: The Slider Revolution WordPress plugin through 6.6.12 does not check for valid image files upon import, leading to an arbitrary file upload which may be escalated to Remote Code Execution in some server configurations.
